abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32525979, pmid32712878, pmid32710669, pmid32703010, pmid32657445, pmid32710617, pmid32667699, pmid32628638, pmid32706371, pmid32671399, pmid32710500, pmid32702095, pmid32702044, pmid32686943, pmid32700814
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.30
